data.name: MINI-EX
data.description: Motif-Informed Network Inference of cell type-specific gene regulatory networks in plants

evidence: "The pipeline is built using Nextflow DSL2 and has the purpose of infer cell-type specific gene regulatory network using scRNA-Seq data in plants."
"nextflow -C miniex.config run miniex.nf" (users run the pipeline directly from the repo, indicating application-style usage and source-based distribution)

"When publishing results generated using MINI-EX, please cite: Ferrari C., Manosalva PÃ©rez N., Vandepoele K. MINI-EX: Integrative inference of single-cell gene regulatory networks in plants." (shows it directly produces publishable research results)
